医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示膝骨关节炎患者对运动无意识的恐惧膝骨关节炎 (OA) 是疼痛和关节僵硬的常见原因。虽然众所周知，体育锻炼可以缓解症状，但只有十分之一的人经常锻炼。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Study-reveals-unknown-fear-of-exercise-in-knee-osteoarthritis-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Study-reveals-unknown-fear-of-exercise-in-knee-osteoarthritis-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17d7eb3b-1554-49bf-be5b-466a47e99629 Tue, 11 Jun 2024 22:29:52 -0400 Study reveals unconscious fear of exercise in knee osteoarthritis patients
研究表明，抗氧化剂可以对抗高脂肪饮食引起的女性生殖问题意大利的研究人员审查了生物基质中的抗氧化剂如何预防女性因高脂肪饮食引起的生殖问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Antioxidants-combat-high-fat-diet-induced-female-reproductive-issues-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Antioxidants-combat-high-fat-diet-induced-female-reproductive-issues-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86738c26-a5ec-46b3-a48d-1db03357d31f Tue, 11 Jun 2024 21:58:00 -0400 Antioxidants combat high-fat diet-induced female reproductive issues, study reveals
脓毒症护理中的精准医学：识别和治疗儿童 PHES 亚组脓毒症是世界各地儿童死亡的主要原因，可能会出现多种体征和症状，导致一刀切的治疗策略无效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Precision-medicine-in-sepsis-care-Identifying-and-treating-the-PHES-subgroup-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Precision-medicine-in-sepsis-care-Identifying-and-treating-the-PHES-subgroup-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43e42693-72b9-4119-81bb-fbf08bd69ea9 Tue, 11 Jun 2024 21:20:25 -0400 Precision medicine in sepsis care: Identifying and treating the PHES subgroup in children
减毒病毒有助于消除小鼠癌症西北医学科学家发现，一种减毒（减毒）病毒可以帮助消除小鼠的癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Attenuated-virus-helps-eliminate-cancer-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Attenuated-virus-helps-eliminate-cancer-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=271ececa-1047-401d-bd89-e21896f6d1a2 Tue, 11 Jun 2024 21:13:36 -0400 Attenuated virus helps eliminate cancer in mice
高流量氧气技术在小儿无管气道手术中与传统麻醉同样安全昆士兰大学的研究表明，在儿童无管上呼吸道手术中，一种新的高流量氧气技术与标准麻醉方法一样安全。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/High-flow-oxygen-technique-equally-safe-as-traditional-anesthesia-in-pediatric-tubeless-airway-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/High-flow-oxygen-technique-equally-safe-as-traditional-anesthesia-in-pediatric-tubeless-airway-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7790e818-3935-4fcd-a6ac-3bf971b6f28b Tue, 11 Jun 2024 21:09:20 -0400 High-flow oxygen technique equally safe as traditional anesthesia in pediatric tubeless airway surgery
拜登政府推进从信用评分中消除医疗债务的计划根据消费者金融保护局周二提出的联邦法规，美国人将不再需要担心医疗债务会拖累他们的信用评分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Biden-administration-advances-plan-to-remove-medical-debt-from-credit-scores.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Biden-administration-advances-plan-to-remove-medical-debt-from-credit-scores.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ea5efb6-650e-4f42-b9fb-32bccc019374 Tue, 11 Jun 2024 16:49:50 -0400 Biden administration advances plan to remove medical debt from credit scores
具有感官电子皮肤的下一代软机器人增强患者护理北卡罗来纳大学教堂山分校的科学家们创造了配备电子皮肤和人造肌肉的创新软机器人，使它们能够感知周围环境并实时调整自己的动作，根据论文《电子皮肤启发的感知机器人》植入物”，《自然通讯》。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Next- Generation-soft-robots-with-sensory-e-skin-enhance- Patient-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Next- Generation-soft-robots-with-sensory-e-skin-enhance- Patient-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11465fef-49ef-4e27-b3bf-e2987e7b9740 Tue, 11 Jun 2024 15:39:08 -0400 Next-generation soft robots with sensory e-skin enhance patient care
革命性的人工智能工具可通过全身 PET/CT 扫描检测多种癌症根据 2024 年核医学和分子影像学会年会上发表的研究，一种新颖的 AI 方法可以通过全身 PET/CT 扫描准确检测出六种不同类型的癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Revolutionary-AI-tool-detects-multiple-cancers-in-whole-body-PETCT-scans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Revolutionary-AI-tool-detects-multiple-cancers-in-whole-body-PETCT-scans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5befadc0-4fe6-4066-85d5-a119d7462034 Tue, 11 Jun 2024 15:34:50 -0400 Revolutionary AI tool detects multiple cancers in whole-body PET/CT scans
研究人员设计水溶性组氨酸激酶以增强抗生素药物筛选一种称为组氨酸激酶的细菌酶是新型抗生素的有希望的目标。然而，开发针对这种酶的药物一直很困难，因为它是一种“疏水”蛋白质，一旦从细胞膜中的正常位置移除就会失去其结构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Researchers-engineer-water-solved-histidine-kinase-for-enhanced-antibiotic-drug-screens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Researchers-engineer-water-solved-histidine-kinase-for-enhanced-antibiotic-drug-screens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2033d4ee-9b4b-4c6d-a363-07776bd2ade3 Tue, 11 Jun 2024 14:48:31 -0400 Researchers engineer water-soluble histidine kinase for enhanced antibiotic drug screens
Newcells Biotech 通过重要任命加强高管和美国团队Valeria Chichagova 博士被任命为技术总监，Colin Brown 博士被任命为首席科学官，Lyle Armstrong 教授被任命为科学顾问。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Newcells-Biotech-strengthens-executive-and-US-team-with-key-appointments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240611/Newcells-Biotech-strengthens-executive-and-US-team-with-key-appointments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bcacc9cb-0187-4493-94d2-cb4691479b50 Tue, 11 Jun 2024 09:20:00 -0400 Newcells Biotech strengthens executive and US team with key appointments
